dcterms:description: This publicly available clinical dataset contains images from 10 patients reconstructed using two different kernels and two different slice thicknesses on a 512 × 512 pixel grid. The data used in this paper has a slice thickness of 1 mm and reconstruction kernel D30 (medium). The dataset is split into a training set containing the first 8 patients, with a total of 4800 slices, and a validation set containing the final 2 patients with a total of 1136 slices.
dcterms:title: Mayo low-dose CT data

dcterms:creator: H. Almqvist
dcterms:description: Images gathered as part of a clinical study of a GE prototype photon-counting system. The patients were scanned at Karolinska Insitutet, Stockholm, Sweden and at the University of Wisconsin–Madison, Madison, WI. The dataset includes reconstructed 70 keV virtual monoenergetic images with filtered backprojection on a 512×512 pixel grid with 0.42 mm slice thickness.
dcterms:title: Photon-counting CT data
